Title: Sex Education
Plot: An STD outbreak amongst Pawnee seniors prompts Leslie to conduct a sex education class. Ron helps Tom adjust to life without technology. Ben and April meet Congressman Murray for the first time.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Darlene Hunt, Todd Sherry, Adam Harrington, Jay Jackson, Alex Morris, Jay Burns, John Storey, Mike Monteleone, Anne Bellamy, Marlena Poles, Barry Ashley
